TITLE: Import Comments - FastComments
HEADING: Import Comments
INPUT_FILE_LABEL: Input File (Drag and Drop or Click to Upload)
EMAIL_NOTIFICATION: You'll receive an email notifying you when it's complete.
REFRESH_FOR_STATUS: Refresh the page to get the latest status.
NO_IMPORTS: You don't have any pending or past imports.
MUUT_SITE_HINT: For example, if your site is on the domain "https://blog.fastcomments.com" then enter that. Include the protocol ("https://").
ADVANCED_DISQUS_HINT: Check this if importing from WordPress. Also, for example, if you have been passing Page IDs to the Disqus widget instead of letting Disqus use the page URL, check this option. If your comments aren't showing up, try reimporting with this checked.
WORDPRESS_CSV_PLUGIN_LINK: WebToffee's WordPress Comments Import & Export plugin
WORDPRESS_CSV_LARGE_FILES: For very large files (>1GB), please reach out to support.
WORDPRESS_CSV_MIGRATION_TIP: Migrating away from WordPress and not using article ids anymore? Simply change put the article URL in the value for "comment_post_ID".
ADVANCED_JUST_COMMENTS_LABEL: Advanced: Page Identifiers (use default if unsure).
ADVANCED_JUST_COMMENTS_HINT: For example, if you have been passing Page IDs to the JustComments widget instead of letting JustComments use the Page URL, pick Item ID. If you don't know what this is you should probably not change it.
FASTCOMMENTS_API_HINT: You might want to also consider using the
ERROR_INVALID_FILE_COMMENTO: Looks like that file is invalid. For Commento imports, upload either the ".gz" or ".json" file you exported from Commento.
ERROR_INVALID_FILE_DISQUS: Looks like that file is invalid. For Disqus imports, you don't have to extract the gzipped file. Simply upload the ".gz" file you exported from Disqus.
ERROR_INVALID_FILE_HYVOR_TALK: Looks like that file is invalid. For Hyvor Talk imports, simply upload the ".json" file you exported from their platform.
ERROR_INVALID_FILE_FASTCOMMENTS: Looks like that file is invalid. For FastComments imports, only CSV files are supported.
ERROR_INVALID_FILE_MUUT: Looks like that file is invalid. For Muut imports, you don't have to extract the gzipped file. Simply upload the ".gz" file you exported from Muut.
ERROR_MUUT_BASE_URL_REQUIRED: Enter a base url for this import (like https://blog.fastcomments.com).
ERROR_MUUT_PROTOCOL_REQUIRED: Please include the protocol for the base url (like https://blog.fastcomments.com).
ERROR_INVALID_FILE_OPENWEB: Looks like that file is invalid. For OpenWeb imports, only CSV files are supported.
ERROR_INVALID_FILE_INTENSEDEBATE: Looks like that file is invalid. For IntenseDebate imports, you don't have to extract the gzipped file. Simply upload the ".gz" file you exported from IntenseDebate.
ERROR_INVALID_FILE_WORDPRESS_CSV: Looks like that file is invalid. For WordPress imports, only CSV files are supported.
ERROR_INVALID_FILE_WORDPRESS_XML: Looks like that file is invalid. For WordPress imports, only XML files are supported.
ERROR_INVALID_FILE_JUST_COMMENTS: Looks like that file is invalid. The file should be of "json" file type.
ERROR_GENERIC: Something went wrong! Please try again later.
ERROR_UPLOAD_FAILED: Failed to upload file. Please try again later.
ERROR_CREATE_IMPORT_FAILED: We couldn't create an import. Please try again later.
ADVANCED_COMMENTO_DEDUPE_LABEL: Skip duplicate comments based on content?
ADVANCED_COMMENTO_DEDUPE_HINT: Enable this to skip importing comments that have very similar content to existing comments on the same page. Useful if you've already imported some comments and want to avoid duplicates.
